confcost.controller.ke

Class KeyExchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • confcost.controller.ke.KeyExchange
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DiffieHellmanKeyExchange, NoKeyExchange

    public abstract class KeyExchange
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract superclass for all key exchange implementations.

    To add an additional key exchange protocol, the following steps must be taken: 1. Implement a new subclass of KeyExchange 2. Register this subclass to KeyExchange (see register(Class, String))

    Author:
    Marc Eichler
